creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: unsigned; strip of paper featuring images from the Tale of Genji; two women seated behind low tables at L with two other figures outside the room facing them; three female figures within a room L of C; two men outside the room at R
object_name: Handscroll fragment, mounted as hanging scroll
title: The "New Herbs, Part II" Chapter of the Tale of Genji
